remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不在點擊的測試位置，則屬性會是`null`。If the hit test location is not on a , the property will be `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要執行此範例中，建立 Windows 表單，其中包含名為`treeView1`，並填入數個層級的節點。To run this example, create a Windows Form that contains a named `treeView1`, and populate it with several levels of nodes. 將下列程式碼貼到表單，並將產生關聯事件的`treeView1`與`treeView1_MouseDown`方法。Paste the following code into a form, and associate the event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_MouseDown` method.
